description:
Spring marks the start of another new school year at a junior high school in Kamakura. A new transfer student, Ryoichi Kyogoku joins the 8th grade. Kyogoku has a very special proficiency in telepathy and has been ordered by his father to use this ability to scan other people's minds and take over the school.

He instantly gains popularity at school from his good looks and charisma and he sets about taking control of the school. As people begin to fall under Kyogoku's spell, he covertly manipulates his followers and pushes aside anyone who gets in his way.

With the school almost completely under the control of Kyogoku, only one boy seems unaffected—Seki. Does Seki have what it takes to save everyone from the clutches of mind control?

(Source: Scotland Loves Animation)

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

node.description:
supercell is a Japanese creator group made up of 11 people.

__Members:__
• [ryo](https://anilist.co/staff/109941) - music, lyrics, leader, founder
• [Shirow Miwa](https://anilist.co/staff/97974) (三輪士郎) - illustration
• [huke](https://anilist.co/staff/105145) - illustration
• [redjuice](https://anilist.co/staff/107587) - illustration
• Suga (スガ) - illustration
• Maque (マクー) - illustration and animation
• [Yoshiki Usa](https://anilist.co/staff/150014) (宇佐義大) - design
• Hei8ro (丙8郎) - support in illustration and photography
• guitar - support in illustration
• crow - support
• golv - support

__Vocalists:__
• [Nagi Yanagi](https://anilist.co/staff/109637) "nagi" (2009 - 2011)
• Koeda (2011- present)
• [chelly](https://anilist.co/staff/147835) "EGOIST" (2011 - present)
• Ann (guest vocalist)
• gaku (guest vocalist)

__Past Members:__
• 119 (ひけし) - illustration

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ryousuke_Nak) | [Website](http://ryousuke1976.blog123.fc2.com)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). Often collaborates with [Mieko Hosoi](https://anilist.co/staff/107076/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ryousuke_Nak) | [Website](http://ryousuke1976.blog123.fc2.com)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). Often collaborates with [Mieko Hosoi](https://anilist.co/staff/107076/).

ryo is the leader of [supercell](https://anilist.co/staff/103913/supercell). He is the composer, arranger, and lyricist for all their songs.  In 2011 he created the fictional band [EGOIST](https://anilist.co/staff/114169) for the TV anime [Guilty Crown](https://anilist.co/anime/10793).

ryo is the leader of [supercell](https://anilist.co/staff/103913/supercell). He is the composer, arranger, and lyricist for all their songs.  In 2011 he created the fictional band [EGOIST](https://anilist.co/staff/114169) for the TV anime [Guilty Crown](https://anilist.co/anime/10793).

ryo is the leader of [supercell](https://anilist.co/staff/103913/supercell). He is the composer, arranger, and lyricist for all their songs.  In 2011 he created the fictional band [EGOIST](https://anilist.co/staff/114169) for the TV anime [Guilty Crown](https://anilist.co/anime/10793).

[Official Website ](https://watanabe-mayu.jp/)

Mayu Watanabe is a Japanese former idol, singer, actress, and former member of the Japanese idol girl group AKB48 under Team B. In the annual AKB48 General Elections event, she had consistently been voted by fans to rank among the group's top members. She has released five solo singles, many of which have peaked in the top ten in the Oricon charts, and one solo album. She left the group on the last day of 2017 and pursued an acting career until her retirement from the entertainment industry in June 2020.

Taku Mayumura is a Japanese science fiction writer who won the Seiun Award for Novel twice. In 2004 his Shiseikan, written in 1974, was translated into English. He is noted for writing a future-history or space opera set in that universe. He is also known for manga. As of 2004 he teaches at Osaka University of Arts.

Yasushi Akimoto is a Japanese record producer, lyricist and television writer, best known for creating and producing some of Japan's top idol groups Onyanko Club and the [AKB48](https://anilist.co/staff/107010) franchise.

He also contributed in forming South Korean girl group IZ*ONE with collaboration between AKS and Mnet.

In 2016, Japanese idol girl group multimedia project between Yasushi Akimoto, Aniplex, and Sony Music Records called [22/7](https://anilist.co/staff/151947) was formed. The project is described as "idols who transcend dimensions." The members consist of voice actresses who provide the voice and motion capture for their characters, as well as perform as a musical group.

__[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/ryosukeshigenaga/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/R_Shigenaga)__

__Birthplace:__ Kudamatsu City, Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Yamaguchi Kenritsu Karyo High School

__Ryousuke Shigenaga__ is a Japanese keyboardist, lyricist, composer and arranger.

[Website](https://music.mages.co.jp/mikoto/index.html) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/mikoto-ryosuke/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MIKOTO-Ryosuke-426929194116397/)

MIKOTO is a Japanese solo project of singer-songwriter, guitarist and lyricist Ryousuke.

Formerly a music composition unit made up of three members, MIKOTO became a solo endeavor in 2014 after the departure of MEG.ME and Shin'ya.

Achille-Claude Debussy was a French composer. He was one of the most prominent figures associated with Impressionist music, though he himself intensely disliked the term when applied to his compositions. A crucial figure in the transition to the modern era in Western music, he remains one of the most famous and influential of all composers.   (Source: Wikipedia)
